About CloudCosts

Open-source multi-cloud instance cost comparison

What is CloudCosts?

CloudCosts is an open-source tool that helps developers and businesses compare cloud instance costs across multiple providers. Instead of manually checking each cloud provider's pricing pages, CloudCosts aggregates and normalizes pricing data to help you make informed decisions.

Supported Providers

  • Hetzner Cloud - Fully integrated with real-time API data
  • Amazon Web Services (AWS) - Coming soon
  • Microsoft Azure - Coming soon
  • Google Cloud Platform (GCP) - Coming soon
  • Oracle Cloud Infrastructure (OCI) - Coming soon
  • OVH - Coming soon

Features

  • Real-time pricing data from provider APIs
  • Standardized comparison across providers
  • Filter by CPU, memory, price, and region
  • Sort by any specification
  • Mobile-responsive design
  • No tracking or analytics

Data Sources

CloudCosts fetches data directly from cloud provider APIs when available, ensuring the most accurate and up-to-date pricing information. All prices are converted to USD for easy comparison while preserving original pricing in the provider's currency.

Open Source

CloudCosts is completely open source and available on GitHub. We welcome contributions, bug reports, and feature requests from the community.
